pullRequest.title: [MOB-1776] add way to specify mobile auth token

commit.message: initial pass of adding mobile auth tokens to the android sdk
updates the auth token when the email is changes.
Adds additional function w/ params for authToken and no callbacks.

nodes.bodyText:

If not in this ticket, we can have a seperate ticket for adding tests to this method.

commit.message: pass authToken along for GET requests too
check if authToken is null before including it

nodes.bodyText: I think it is better to insert it conditionally, like above for GET, otherwise it looks like the request is trying to authenticate and passes an empty token.
What do you think about SHARED_PREFS_AUTH_TOKEN_KEY? AUTHTOKEN seems a bit hard to read to me.
